71251.name: Miss Shu's First Lesson
71251.desc:
On the battlefield, the Modifier is both one and all. "Never abandon your comrades" is the first lesson every Modifier learns.
When a teammate takes damage on the field, the entire team shares the damage.

71252.name: Urgent Delivery
71252.desc:
Urgent delivery incoming! Put on your headphones and surrender to the music, for the storm is about to begin!
When a Mod hits an enemy, the remaining cooldown of a basic skill on cooldown is reduced by 1 second. This effect can trigger once every 2 seconds.

71253.name: Strange Standards
71253.desc: We have discreetly changed the standards for Modifying Levels. Now, the Modifying Level reaches Ω instantly when a Modifier triggers the Dodge effect.

71254.name: Freeman's Crowbar
71254.desc:
The crux of what legend holds as "true swordsmanship" does not only apply to the swords. Allow me to spar with you using this "Sacred Sword of Physics" called by a Freeman guy.
When Mods hit an enemy with any basic skill, the skill's remaining cooldown is shortened by 30% once per skill. If the skill defeats the enemy, this effect will be triggered again.

71255.name: The Muses' Criteria
71255.desc:
It is paramount that one remains elegant and dignified at all times.
When a Mod is not hit, this Mod's ATK is increased by 15% and the effect is removed when hit. If the Mod is not hit for 15 seconds, this effect is regained.

71256.name: Verifying the Collapse Theory
71256.desc:
If we use the Gen-zone equation as a starting point, perhaps we can also make use of the theory of spatial collapse to trigger a special effect at the moment of closing.
After exiting Modified Mode, deals damage to enemy equal to 20% of the damage they received while in Modified Mode.

71257.name: Fiercer by the Slice
71257.desc:
There is hope of promotion as long as the soldiers keep moving forward.
When a Mod hits an enemy with a normal attack, the Crit Rate of this Mod is increased by 5%. Stacks up to 5 times, and this effect is removed as soon as there is a skill or Ultimate Skill crit.
